Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka managed to stave away a late Indian resurgence, battling their way back through a phenomenal Dasun Shanaka.
India will be hopeful of getting their top-order firing after consecutive collapses.
Suryakumar Yadav's return to runs after the Mumbai Indians batter lit up the second contest with an absolute blitzkrieg.
Axar Patel will be an important moniker to look out for.
Dasun Shanaka’s shrewd captaincy has been a driving force for the Lankans.
Miscellaneous Highlights: A total of 4 T20Is have so far been played at Rajkot with 2 of them being secured batting first while the other 2 have been won chasing.
The average first innings score at Rajkot is 179 while the average score while chasing slumps to 149.
The surface at Rajkot has some turn that could assist the bowlers, but once dew sets in, it should ideally be tilted towards the batters.
Head-to-head: Matches played: 28, India: 18, Sri Lanka: 9.
